caption.p: Molecular docking interaction between the SARS-CoV-2 M pro and 3.beta-Hydroxy-5-cholen-24-oic acid ligand in the active site is shown in purple color, and ligand interacting with the residues is shown in blue color, green color illustrates the residues forming hydrogen bonds, pink color illustrates the residues with hydrophobic (pi-pi/pi-alkyl) stacking, and white color illustrates the residues with carbon-hydrogen interaction.
